info.description: Represents a single blog post, including all its content, metadata, and media. This is the central content type for the website.

Title.description: The main title of the blog post.

Slug.description: The URL-friendly identifier for the post, generated from the title.

BodyContent.description: The main content of the blog post, using Strapi's block editor.

Keywords.description: A comma-separated list of SEO keywords for the post.

MetaDescription.description: A short summary for search engine results (max 160 characters).

FeaturedImage.description: The primary image for the blog post.
